transcript.text:
￼



















































Version 11.0 Release Notes
Product Module

3 min
setup cost for custom size products setup cost for custom size products the admin will be now able to configure the setup cost for the custom size products as well for this, we have added two new settings, “custom size setup cost” and “apply custom size setup cost reorder” to the product settings screen these settings will only appear when you enable the “allow custom size in price calculator” in the custom size tab once configured, this setup cost will be applied to the product price when the customer selects the “custom size” from the size selection and enters the dimensions skip option wise setup cost for reorder skip option wise setup cost for reorder the admin can now consider or skip adding product option wise setup costs for the reorder process suppose you don’t want to charge setup costs for a reordering of the same product in that case, you can just enable the ‘exclude setup cost for reorder’ setting from the product option edit screen or assign product options screen for the individual options
Did this page help you?
